import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import Product from '../components/Product' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import Home from '../components/Home' import { listProducts } from '../actions/productActions' function HomeScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList) const { error, loading, products } = productList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProducts()) }, []) return (
